titleStmt.title: An answer to Monsieur de la Militiere his impertinent dedication of his imaginary triumph, to the king of Great Britain to invite him to embrace the Roman Catholick religion. / By John Bramhall D.D. and Lord Bishop of London-Derry.
titleStmt.author: Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.
La Milletière, Théophile Brachet, sieur de, ca. 1596-1665. Victory of truth for the peace of the Church.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
